First painting in a long time. Feels therapeutic.
I'm totally lost
WRITING.TEXT: I'm on mobile so I apologize for formatting. Also it's long. Potentially triggering for self harm and suicide ideation. I'm terrified of putting this on here but I'm so lost and desperate. My psychologist has said he thinks my dad is a narcissist based on what I've told him and I agree, but it's really hard to say that. It's like my dad is two different people, but no matter which side he's showing he manipulates emotions, reactions, and actual memories. He thinks nothing is his fault and it's everyone else. He doesn't seem to realize he's doing this but has complained about my mom doing the same things. She's a different story. Anyway, I'm 30 but have been hit financially and unable to stabilize my mental health and life so I've been living with him for about 2 years. I'm living on eggshells. He/it's worse even when I've told him I'm suicidal and self harming, he shows compassion and then completely changes and will make it all about him and his feelings and deny mine. He's begun crying when he's upset and I very much care about taking care of other people's feelings. I'm back to hating him but I can't confront him because he'll just turn it against me and I'm also afraid he'll threaten or do suicide. He said years ago he's thought about it and tasted his gun before but can't do that to his kids. I don't see how he can be so blind to himself and everyone around him. I'm tired of living like this and feel like I'm going to explode. Any advice as to how to handle talking to him about stuff? I usually just shut down because I go into spiraling loops of explosive emotions.

WRITING.TITLE: I am so awkward and have no idea what to do about this situation
WRITING.TEXT: I'm sorry if this is the wrong sub, I'm just an incredibly awkward person with very little social skills in some situations. This situation is uncomfortable and crazy for me. A gentleman gave me his number when I was shopping, he's an employee there and he seemed really nice. I've not texted him in two days because I'm honestly scared and have no idea what to do in this situation. I'm not good at communicating or reading social cues. I have no idea how to flirt or recognize it, I just be sincere in what I say and do. I've been obsessing over this and my mental health is taking a blow because I'm so out of my element. I'm sorry, I have no idea what I should do. I have someone who is pressuring me like it's no big deal. To me it is a big deal. Anyway, what should I do? Any advice?

WRITING.TITLE: Finding a job is so difficult.
WRITING.TEXT: Add in trying to get benefits and my mental health problems and I #8217;m spiraling into a depression I #8217;m scared I won #8217;t come out of. I #8217;m trying to find a job that #8217;ll work with my mental health, that pays well, and gives me benefits. I #8217;m in a situation at home that I hate and getting a job will start me in the right direction. But it #8217;s so difficult to find a good job that checks all the boxes. I don #8217;t even know what jobs would work for me but I #8217;m applying to many. Now I #8217;m rambling. Anyway, I have no one to talk to so I thought I #8217;d vent here or maybe even ask for ideas on where to find jobs that might be good for me. Thanks.
I hadn #8217;t, thanks. I #8217;ll look into it. Thank you.
Yeah I check it everyday and have applied to jobs. I #8217;m just having trouble identifying jobs that #8217;ll work for me. I may have to look outside the perimeter of my town. Thank you.

I #8217;ve always been a shy introvert and quiet and in 10th grade (glasses and braces) I was performing really bad in English and another student said, #8216;but you look smart. #8217; I wasn #8217;t impressed.
World on Fire- Les Friction
I would take out student loans and go for the field I really wanted to pursue.
Maybe they have allergies
Positive because I can imagine enough negativity on my own but would like to know what people like about me. Maybe then I can like myself too.
Under the Sea, this is something I #8217;ve actually thought about for a few years.
486 I think. I started a few days after the game launched.

DAO: Most: Zevran. I #8217;m seriously in love with him. #8220;I would storm the gates of the black city with you. #8221; Least: Oghren. WRITING.TITLE: Does anyone else have trouble keeping a job?
WRITING.TEXT: I have OCD, BPD traits, anxiety, and depression. Whenever I start a new job I immediately want to quit because my mental health goes out of control and makes everything miserable as to where I #8217;m constantly holding back anxiety attacks. I #8217;m trying to find a job that doesn #8217;t do this to me but no luck so far. My old job worked with me on this but was too far away without enough lay to continued my new jobs have not been accommodating with my mental health. I feel like I #8217;m constantly on the brink of going insane and I actually want to let loose, to give in. I guess this is mostly a rant

I am on medication, three types and Xanax too to help with anxiety attacks. I can tell that it helps but I #8217;m still struggling a lot. I #8217;ll be talking again to my psychiatrist and psychologist in about 2 weeks and see what they say. I guess part of my anxiety is constantly seeing if I #8217;m alone in it and seeking reassurance. It was an impulse to post
Howdy!
